title: Hunter's Moon; Mirror, Mirror
description: Desiree was in dire need of a distraction. She got more than she bargained for on the night of the Hunter’s Moon.Renovating the old Victorian was a labor of love, but Desiree couldn’t work hard enough to avoid loneliness and the sexy drifter she’d hired as handyman didn’t seem interested in being handy in her bedroom. Short Story Paranormal Romance Spicy/Erotic
author: Liz Montgomery
